title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“...The office they gave me was filthy. I had to clean it with my secretary.” [From an interview with an ousted justice, in the Detroit Free Press, 27 September 1984. Submitted by Rudy Simons, Oak Park, Michigan.]
